. The GOP plan would cut all$ 327 million from Title X. That prompted an angry response from pro-choice groups, who said the program provides contraception and cancer screening, among other services. While these politicians attack abortion coverage from every angle, they now want to deny funding for birth control, even though that's the best way to prevent unintended pregnancy, said Nancy Keenan , president of NARAL Pro-Choice America. I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score, said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers.
